references.paper_title: Spatial implicit neural representations for global-scale species mapping
references.reason: This paper introduces the Spatial Implicit Neural Representation (SINR) model, which is the foundation upon which this paper's proposed LE-SINR model is built.

references.paper_title: Species distribution models: ecological explanation and prediction across space and time
references.reason: This is a highly cited review paper providing a comprehensive overview of species distribution models (SDMs), which are central to the research presented in the paper.

references.paper_title: Novel methods improve prediction of species’ distributions from occurrence data
references.reason: This paper details novel methods for improving the prediction of species distributions, offering significant improvements over traditional methods and directly relevant to the methodologies used in this paper.

references.paper_title: GPT4geo: How a language model sees the world’s geography
references.reason: This study evaluates the capabilities of LLMs in handling geospatial tasks and is highly relevant due to the focus of this paper on combining language models with geographic data.

references.paper_title: Satclip: Global, general-purpose location embeddings with satellite imagery
references.reason: This research provides a novel approach to creating location embeddings using satellite imagery, which aligns with the paper’s goal of integrating various data sources for improved range estimation.
